#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
using namespace std;
long long int a[100004];
long long int S[100004];
long long int count[100004];
#define INF 1000000000;
int main()
{
    long long int t,n,tmp,max,ans,i;
    scanf("%lld", &t);
    while(t--){
        ans = 0;
        scanf("%lld",&n);
        for(i = 1; i <= n; i++){
            scanf("%lld", &a[i]);
        }
        S[1] = a[1];
        count[1] = 1;
        for (i = 2; i <= n; i++){
            tmp = S[i-1]+a[i];
            if(tmp == a[i]){
                S[i] = tmp;
                count[i] = count[i-1]+1;
            }
            else{
                if(a[i] > tmp){
                    S[i] = a[i];
                    count[i] = 1;
                }
                else{
                    S[i] = tmp;
                    count[i] = count[i-1];
                }
            }
            }
            max = -INF;
            for(i = 1; i <= n; i++){
                if(S[i] > max){
                    max = S[i];
                }
            }
            for(i = 1; i <= n; i++){
                if(S[i] == max){
                    ans = ans+count[i];
                }
            }
            printf("%lld %lld\n", max,ans);
        }
    return 0;
}
